actions.description: Computes and returns the hash of the input.
actions.name: hash

properties.description: The cryptographic algorithm that will be used to hash the input.
properties.label: Cryptographic Algorithm
properties.name: algorithm

properties.description: Calculates the hash of the provided input.
properties.label: Input
properties.name: input

actions.title: Hash

actions.description: Computes and returns the HMAC of the input.
actions.name: hmac

properties.description: The cryptographic algorithm that will be used to hash the input.
properties.label: Cryptographic Algorithm
properties.name: algorithm

properties.description: Generates a cryptographic HMAC for the provided input.
properties.label: Input
properties.name: input

properties.description: Key that will be used for the encryption.
properties.label: Key
properties.name: key

actions.title: Hmac

actions.description: Decrypts PGP encrypted file using private key and passphrase.
actions.name: pgpDecrypt

properties.description: Private PGP key that will decrypt the file. Make sure there is a new line after the PGP header.
properties.label: Private PGP Key
properties.name: privateKey

properties.description: File object with content that will be decrypted.
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

properties.description: Passphrase that was used for encryption.
properties.label: Passphrase
properties.name: passphrase

actions.title: PGP Decrypt

actions.description: Encrypts the file using PGP public key.
actions.name: pgpEncrypt

properties.description: Public PGP key of the recipient of the encrypted file. Make sure there is a new line after the PGP header.
properties.label: Public PGP Key
properties.name: publicKey

properties.description: File object with content that will be encrypted.
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

actions.title: PGP Encrypt

actions.description: Decrypts RSA encrypted file using RSA private key.
actions.name: rsaDecrypt

properties.description: Private RSA key that will decrypt the file.
properties.label: Private RSA Key
properties.name: privateKey

properties.description: File object with content that will be decrypted.
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

actions.title: RSA Decrypt

actions.description: Encrypts the file using the RSA public key.
actions.name: rsaEncrypt

properties.description: Public RSA key of the recipient of the encrypted file.
properties.label: Public RSA Key
properties.name: publicKey

properties.description: File object with content that will be encrypted.
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

actions.title: RSA Encrypt

properties.description: Private RSA key that will be used to sign the file.
properties.label: Private RSA Key
properties.name: privateKey

properties.description: File object with content that will be signed
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

actions.description: Verify the signature using public RSA key.
actions.name: verify

outputSchema.description: Outcome of the verification of the signature.

properties.description: Public RSA key that will verify the signature.
properties.label: Public RSA Key
properties.name: publicKey

properties.description: File object whose signature will be verified.
properties.label: File Entry
properties.name: file

properties.description: Signature that will be verified.
properties.label: Signature
properties.name: signature
